channel.title: Item goes to weapon slot/ Editing items stats
channel.description:
Ok i recently switched to a client. and ive updated all the shop item ids t the new ones but when i equip them they all go to my wepon slot. i went into item.java and i added the cape to the end of the capes list, compiled and itstill goes to the weapon slot.
Editing items stats. I wanna make my new items like the ones on real rs. like adding the same stats like +7 str or w/e.

item.title: Item goes to weapon slot/ Editing items stats
item.dc:creator: @Runescape_GFX Runescape GFX
item.description:
@Runescape_GFX wrote:

Ok…Uhm lets say you want to add uhm void knights top k?

go to item4.java
search

public static int body[] =

You Should See A Whole Bunch Of Item Ids (Bodies of course)
All you have to do is add

13591,(space)

To The Front,

So It’ll Be Something Like This

#####, #####, #####, #####

The " # " 's Meaning The Ids Of The Bodies Your Adding.

The Search

public static int platebody[] =

And repeat the process.

After That, Save Compile, Run

And Oh My Gosh You Got Your Self Some Void =)

To Add Stats and prices To It Just Add anywhere in Item.cfg

Did That Help?

Read full topic
item.source: Item goes to weapon slot/ Editing items stats
